titleInfo.title: Christian Brothers College Choral Club presents "The Mikado"

mods.abstract: The CBC Choral Club staged Gilbert and Sullivan's The Mikado, in 1953, "Assisted by students from Holy Names, St. Thomas, Immaculate Conception, St. Agnes, and Sacred Heart High Schools." Performances were held on April 14th and 15th in the evening. The venue was the Ellis Auditorium in downtown Memphis. Ellis Auditorium was demolished in 1997.
